OrgName.entry: BLACK ARTS THEATRE AND CULTURE COLLECTIVE (BATACC)

Desc.entry: An association of people based at the Hub who are committed to bringing and developing black arts and theatre to and within Sheffield. Acts as a platform for debate about the future of black community arts. Works with others to mount a regular programme of arts, theatre and cultural events in Sheffield. Membership is open to all.

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
